Text: There is no zappa plays zappa DVD.
Contir you idiot, there is a Zappa Plays Zappa DVD.  It was recorded last December in Portland and Seattle.  Conan even held it up while introducing the band.
Sod buying the DVD, will somebody please upload it. Preferably a high quality AVI (some of us do have monthly bandwidth limitations, despite being on an unlimited package).

I was at the Seattle show last year. It was incredible.
Don't miss it if they are coming to your town.
Nice torrent DoctrJimmy. thanks. Very good quality - I saw this live at Shepards Bush 25th September 2007 -Excellent line-up too.

I was at the Seattle show last year. It was incredible.
Don't miss it if they are coming to your town.

This reminds me of the song: Elvis has just left the building.

Do yourself one better and go see them live. 
I saw them in Ottawa couple years back, they play frank's songs beautifully, it was an honor.
